description:
They Came From the Sky is tiny, retro styled, highly-addictive and fast paced arcade game wherein you take the role of one of the Flying Saucers in the 1950s with one and only one Mission: Make a delicious juicy "Human Smoothie"! 

Your misson is to "rescue" all humans from earth. Some humans will try to take your ship down, so be careful!

- Perfect for competing with your friends (1-4 players supported)
- Excellent coffee-break game!
- Insanely Addictive and Simple gameplay
- Infinite replayability >>> Get the highest score you can!
- Choose from 6 unlockable Flying Saucers, each with their own unique abilities.
- Abduct a lot of humans, cats, chickens, birds or Elvis!
- Unique retro pixel-art graphics and sounds with 50s feel.
- Don't wait! Prepare a juicy "Human Smoothie"!
name: They Came From the Sky
